ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2003-22
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT A. WRIGHT of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Associate Secretary to the Cabinet and National Security Advisor to the Prime Minister, to hold office during pleasure, effective December 12, 2003.
